10:18 <vmassol> going to upgrade myxwiki.org today  
10:18 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
10:21 <gdelhumeau> the build is still broken on ci  
10:37 <tmortagne> ye still SNAPSHOT vs timestamp mixup  
10:37 <vmassol> war upgrade done, working on XAR now  
10:38 <vmassol> tmortagne: gm, fyi I got this on myxwiki.org startup (5.2): https://gist.github.com/vmassol/7097188  
10:39 <tmortagne> vmassol: seems to be a bug in XWikiAttachment#getReference  
10:40 <tmortagne> looks like the filename is null or empty for some reason  
10:40 <tmortagne> in document praline:Mockups.MeetingManager

17:51 <mflorea> vmassol: any idea how to fix http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/4527/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-platform-extension-script/console ?  
17:51 <mflorea> what is the problem?  
17:52 <mflorea> seems to be a conflict between xwiki-commons-extension-api:5.3-SNAPSHOT and xwiki-commons-extension-api:5.3-20131022.140450-27 but both are snapshot versions  
17:54 <tmortagne> seems to me that RequireUpperBoundDeps compare maven model version instead of model base version  
17:55 <tmortagne> in any case it's a bug in this plugin and we should disable it  
17:55 <vmassol> mflorea: checking  
17:55 <vmassol> isit always failing in the same module?  
17:55 <mflorea> on extension-script yet, I can reproduce locally  
17:56 <vmassol> ok so what I can do ATM is just not run the check for this module while we find a solution  
17:56 <vmassol> wdyt?  
17:56 <vmassol> how do you reproduce locally?  
17:57 <mflorea> just mvn clean install  
17:57 <vmassol> mflorea: if I knew this, I would fix it ;)  
17:57 <vmassol> I'll try again  
17:57 <vmassol> with -U  
17:57 <mflorea> let me try with -U too  
17:57 <tmortagne> I doubt the issue will be only with that module  
17:57 <mflorea> I'm building just extension-script module  
17:58 <tmortagne> we used the have the exact same error with oldcore  
17:58 <mflorea> indeed, ci didn't build the entire platform, only the modules that were affected by the latest changes  
17:58 <mflorea> so there might be other modules affected  
17:59 <mflorea> I'm going to trigger a full platform build  
17:59 <vmassol> ok got it, I'll debug, I'm turning it off ATM till I find the problem  
18:12 <vmassol> ok problem fixed :)  
18:12 <vmassol> removing the skip ....  
18:15 <vmassol> FTR it was http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MENFORCER-134  
18:17 <vmassol> we got lucky ;)
